channel.title: Mother's Basement
channel.description:
Geoff Thew, makes a living analyzing anime and other pop culture from the comfort of his mother's basement. Well, okay, actually he lives in a nice apartment now, but don't tell anyone, alright? He's known for his detailed breakdowns of the hidden secrets in anime openings, his fight scene analysis, and the Public Service Anime series, which provides helpful advice for everyday problems, like being caught up in a harem, or being transported to another world.
Join him every Tuesday and Saturday for deep dives into art that will give you a new appreciation for your favourite anime, video games, and films.
channel.itunes:author: Mother's Basement
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mother's Basement

item.title: The WORST Anime of ALL TIME - 10th Anniversary
item.description:
Meet Yixuan, the S-Rank Grandmaster, in Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.0! Explore the all-new Waifei Peninsula and claim epic anniversary rewards by pre-registering for the new update! https://hoyo.link/gjVZEbkmX #zzzero #NextstopWaifei #Yixuan #xbox You've seen the best, now it's time for the rest. These are the worst anime I've seen in my entire career.
Check out our new podcast @questforthebestpod
chapters 00:00 Intro 01:51 Harem Hell 05:21 Peak Disappointment 08:12 The Real Worst Isekai 11:09 Seven Deadly Frames 14:26 An Insult to H*ntai 16:48 ZZZ 18:39 The Anime That Can Ruin Your Life 21:14 The worst thing that ever happened to me, personally 23:28 Literally Hurts to Watch 26:01 THE WORST ANIME
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/mothersbasement
Subscribe to Mother's Basement for anime and gaming videos every week: https://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=UCBs2Y3i14e1NWQxOGliatmg
Validate me!
Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/G0ffThew Also on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mothersbasementofficial And check out my Steam Curator page: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/mothers_basement/curation and the new Mother's Basement Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/mothersbasement
In the depths of his Mother's Basement, Geoff Thew creates videos analyzing the storytelling techniques of anime and video games. He has been named the number one Worst YouTube Anime Reviewer by The Top Tens.
